name: WHILE (TRUE)
description:
WHILE (TRUE)

Meet Bob. Bob is a bad programmer, his programs gets stuck in loops all the time.
Help him fix his loops.

How to play

Help Bob break his loops.

Move around with WASD or arrow keys.

Open the consoles with SPACE.

Controll machines with WASD.

To disable the music press M and to disable audio press N (but sounds already playing will still be played unfortunately so do it early in the game)

Tools used
* Unity 2020.1
* Aseprite
* Ableton Live with Sylenth1
* Gimp
* Audacity

All graphic, music, audio and code was created during the Jam. No assets from Assets store was used. A few standard Unity provided packages was added and used (Universal shader pipeline and Cinemachine).
